incomingsupport.subject: [Tīkiti: %s]
incomingsupport.body1: Kua tukuna e tētahi kiritaki te mōhiohio e whai ake nei

secret_link.subject: I tukua e %{sender_email} tētahi karere huna ki a koe
secret_link.sent_you_secret: i tuku i tētahi karere huna ki a koe:
secret_link.link_works_once: Ka mahi tēnei hononga kotahi wā anake. I muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

welcome.subject: Whakaūngia tō pūkete Onetime Secret
welcome.title: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{product_name}!
welcome.verify_prompt: Tēnā manatokohia tō wāhitau īmēra mā te pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:
welcome.copy_link_prompt: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:
welcome.postscript: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}. Mēnā kāore koe i te tūmanako i tēnei pōwhiri, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei karere.

password_request.subject: Tautuhi anō tō kupuhipa (%{display_domain})
password_request.title: Tautuhi Anō Tō Kupuhipa
password_request.request_notice: I whiwhi mātou i tētahi tono kia tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name}.
password_request.copy_link_prompt: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:
password_request.ignore_notice: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i te tautuhi anō kupuhipa, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei īmēra.
password_request.postscript: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}.

incoming_secret.subject: Kua whiwhi koe i tētahi karere huna
incoming_secret.received_message: Kua whiwhi koe i tētahi karere haumaru:
incoming_secret.someone_sent: Kua tukuna e tētahi tētahi karere haumaru ki a koe mā %{display_domain}.
incoming_secret.view_instructions: Hei tiro i tēnei karere huna, pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:
incoming_secret.link_works_once: Ka mahi tēnei hononga kotahi wā anake. I muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

secret_revealed.subject: Kua tirohia tō karere huna
secret_revealed.title: Kua Tirohia Tō Karere Huna
secret_revealed.viewed_on: I tirohia tō karere huna i %{date}.
secret_revealed.automated_notice: He pānui aunoa tēnei. Kāore he mahi e hiahiatia ana.
secret_revealed.manage_preferences_prompt: Hei whakahaere i ō hiahia pānui:

expiration_warning.subject: Ka pau wawe tō hononga karere huna
expiration_warning.expires_in: Ka pau tō hononga karere huna i roto i %{time_remaining}
expiration_warning.view_button: Tirohia tō karere huna kia kore anō i pau
expiration_warning.after_expiration: I muri i te pauhanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna, ā, kāore e taea te whakaora.
expiration_warning.view_before_gone: Tirohia kia kore anō i ngaro:
expiration_warning.after_expiration_short: I muri i te pauhanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

organization_invitation.subject: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{organization_name}
organization_invitation.title: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{organization_name}!
organization_invitation.body: Kua pōwhiri a %{inviter_email} i a koe ki te hono ki "%{organization_name}" hei %{role_description}.
organization_invitation.link_instruction: Tārua rānei me te whakapiri i tēnei hononga:
organization_invitation.expiry_notice: Ka pau tēnei pōwhiri i roto i te %{days} rā.
organization_invitation.decline_instruction: Mēnā kāore koe e hiahia ki te hono, ka taea e koe te karo noa i tēnei īmēra, te whakakāhore rānei i te pōwhiri.
organization_invitation.postscript: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{invited_email}. Mēnā kāore koe i te tūmanako i tēnei pōwhiri, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei karere.

password_changed.subject: Kua hurihia tō kupuhipa (%{display_domain})
password_changed.title: Kua Hurihia Tō Kupuhipa
password_changed.body: I hurihia tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name} i %{date} i %{time}.
password_changed.security_notice: Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakaū i tō pūkete ināianei mā te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa me te whakapā atu ki te tautoko.

email_changed.subject: Kua hurihia tō wāhitau īmēra (%{display_domain})
email_changed.title: Kua Hurihia Tō Wāhitau Īmēra
email_changed.body: I hurihia te wāhitau īmēra mō tō pūkete %{product_name} ki %{new_email_masked} i %{date}.
email_changed.security_notice: Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakapā atu ki te tautoko ināianei, kei kino tō pūkete.

email_change_confirmation.subject: Manatoko tō wāhitau īmēra hou (%{display_domain})
email_change_confirmation.title: Manatoko Tō Wāhitau Īmēra Hou
email_change_confirmation.body: Tēnā manatokohia tēnei wāhitau īmēra kia oti te panoni mō tō pūkete %{product_name}.
email_change_confirmation.copy_link_prompt: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:

mfa_enabled.subject: Kua whakahohehia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga (%{display_domain})
mfa_enabled.title: Kua Whakahohehia Te Manatoko Rua-Āhuatanga
mfa_enabled.body: I whakahohehia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date}.
mfa_enabled.security_notice: Kei te haumaru ake tō pūkete. Me whakauru e koe tētahi waehere manatoko mai i tō taupānga manatoko i te takiuru.

mfa_disabled.subject: Kua whakakāhoretia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga (%{display_domain})
mfa_disabled.title: Kua Whakakāhoretia Te Manatoko Rua-Āhuatanga
mfa_disabled.body: I whakakāhoretia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date}.
mfa_disabled.warning_notice: Kei te iti ake te haumaru o tō pūkete. Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakaū i tō pūkete ināianei.

new_login_alert.subject: Takiuru hou ki tō pūkete (%{display_domain})
new_login_alert.title: Kua Kitea Tētahi Takiuru Hou
new_login_alert.body: I kitea tētahi takiuru hou ki tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date} i %{time}.
new_login_alert.not_you_notice: Mēnā kāore tēnei koe, kei kino pea tō pūkete.

member_removed.subject: Kua tangohia koe i %{organization_name}
member_removed.title: Kua Tangohia Koe i %{organization_name}
member_removed.body: Kua tangohia koe i te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" i %{product_name}.

role_changed.subject: Kua hurihia tō tūranga i %{organization_name}
role_changed.title: Kua Hurihia Tō Tūranga
role_changed.body: Kua hurihia tō tūranga i "%{organization_name}" mai i %{old_role} ki %{new_role}.

organization_deleted.subject: Kua mukua te whakahaere "%{organization_name}"
organization_deleted.title: Kua Mukua Te Whakahaere
organization_deleted.body: Kua mukua te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" i %{product_name}. Kua tangohia ngā raraunga katoa e pā ana.

payment_receipt.subject: Rīhiti utu mō %{product_name}
payment_receipt.title: Rīhiti Utu
payment_receipt.body: Ngā mihi mō tō utu. Kei konei ō taipitopito utu:

payment_failed.subject: I rahua te utu mō %{product_name}
payment_failed.title: I Rahua Te Utu
payment_failed.body: Kāore mātou i taea te tukatuka i tō utu mō %{product_name}. Tēnā whakahou i tō tikanga utu kia kore ai te whakamutuhanga ratonga.

trial_expiring.subject: Ka pau tō whakamātautau %{product_name} i roto i %{days_remaining} rā
trial_expiring.title: Kei Te Mutu Wawe Tō Whakamātautau
trial_expiring.body: Ka pau tō whakamātautau koreutu o %{product_name} i roto i %{days_remaining} rā. Whakapai ake ināianei kia puritia te urunga ki ngā āhuatanga katoa.

subscription_changed.subject: Kua hurihia tō ohaurunga %{product_name}
subscription_changed.title: Kua Hurihia Te Ohaurunga
subscription_changed.body: Kua hurihia tō ohaurunga %{product_name} mai i %{old_plan} ki %{new_plan}.
